summary: A newlywed couple, Raj and Priya, move to Switzerland and become friends with their new neighbors, Vicky and Sonia. But one day, Sonia is murdered and Raj is accused of the murder. He goes on the run in order to prove himself innocent.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Bobby Deol|Kareena Kapoor|Bipasha Basu|Johnny Lever|Amita Nangia|Sheela Sharma|Narendra Bedi|Amrit Patel|Sharat Saxena|Dalip Tahil|Mink Singh|Jakob Tritten|John Peter|Alain Bedard|Carlton Bowen|Andrzej Gliwicz|Marcelo M.|Anthea Whittaker
keywords: visual impairment|latex|blood|woman wrapped in a towel|neighbor
director: Directors: Abbas Alibhai Burmawalla, Mastan Alibhai Burmawalla
title: Ajnabee
